name: Race to Area 51
description:
Race to Area 51 is a Top Down infinite runner where the player is raiding Area 51 to free the aliens wrongfully captive there. In this game the player will use arrow keys to dodge infinite procedural obstacles and enemies who fire projectiles in order to survive the longest possible time.

How to Play:

Arrow Keys to move

R to Restart

Game Sprites Made by:

Platformer Art Complete Pack by Kenney Vleugels (www.kenney.nl)
